title: A Dream of Norway
creator_credit: Ronald Craigen, Edgar H. Anstey, Bergen Line and British Transport Films
brief_description: From the moment that the “Leda” sets sail for Bergen, the holidaymaker’s imagination reaches forward to the fjord and mountain roads, glaciers and waterfalls, with Edward Grieg’s “Variations on an old Norwegian romance” to reflect the changing moods of Western Norway.
creator_credit_for_label: Ronald Craigen, Edgar H. Anstey, Bergen Line and British Transport Films
